Account Retension

Track your accounts performance and find non active accounts

Keep your your hard-earned clients in house, upsell cross-sell to increase customer lifetime value and ensure your loyal clientele stays with you. Broker Business Pro provides automatic mechanism that take action when users’ activity patterns change, segmented clients are approached with promotions, and potential closing accounts are approached electronically and personally by Customer Service.
